title: Settling in the UK
subtitle: Your first steps made simple.
body: From GP registration to opening a bank account, we guide you through the basics of starting your new life in the UK.

title: Learn English, Build Confidence
subtitle: Language is power.
body: Free and low-cost ESOL courses to help you communicate, connect, and grow — no matter your background.

title: Find Jobs & Start Earning
subtitle: Discover new work opportunities.
body: Explore job support, CV writing, and interview tips to start earning sooner.

title: Start a Business, Be Your Own Boss
subtitle: Turn your skills into income.
body: Step-by-step guidance on business registration, funding, and building your brand in the UK.

title: Empower Your Journey
subtitle: You’re not alone in this.
body: Join our workshops and support groups to get advice, meet others, and feel supported every step of the way.
